long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides ads on https://HowTheMarketWorks.com. (The ads might still appear for a second before being hidden).

NOTE: This does not block the ads from loading instead it only hides them from view. If you don't want ads to be able to load, then install an ad blocker as well.
